content.rendered:
Senior Quality Engineer

Designation

Senior Engineer

Job Location

Bagodara, Gujarat

Qualification

Diploma Civil / B.E Civil

Comunication Skills

Very good interpersonal & communication skills in English & Hindi Excellent presentations skills

Experience

05-07 Years

Job Profile

  • Product quality inspection prior to dispatch
  • Hands on Experience of Pre & Post Pour Inspection of precast concrerte mould and documentation
  • The preference shall be given to candidate having knowledge of repairing material and experience of repairing of concrete products
  • The candidate should have good knowledge of concrete mix design, candidates having working experience with SCC and design mix of SCC shall be added advantage
  • Responsible for ISO audit of quality department :
    • Complying the necessary guidelines as per IMS (Integrated Management System),
    • To support continual implementation and improvement of IMS standards,
    • To oversee requirements of IMS related formats & adherence for the (respective) Department.
